ngoList.actName: Shri Patcheappane Society for Education Research a
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Academic education with oral and aural approach. Classes from Pre Primary to High School. free medical check-up for the students. co-curricular activities like Art craft dance and yoga etc., Students participated in Science Exhibitions, competitions & Sports events.Arranging outings,picnics and tours for children. Our 1st set of 10th std students appeared for Board examination in March 2007 achieved 100% pass result.They had created history in Pondicherry. This trend is followed in 2008 to 2014 for 100% pass result in Board examination. In 2014-2015 four of our students got 2nd,3rd,4th and 6th rank in the merit list of deaf category in the state of Tamilnadu and Pondicherry. Most of the students continuing their higher studies as B.com,B.sc., Polytechnic and integrated B.Tech etc. Students participated in Regional level and State Level Science Exhibition and won 1st and 3rd prize respectively. Students also participated in Southern India Science Fair 2008 and 2016 and won 1st prize in 2008 and 2nd prize in 2016 in High School Level and qualified for national level. Students participated in sports drawing and cultural competitions and won many prizes. Conducting many Hearing Awareness programme. Every year we are organizing Blood donation camp. State Award received for outstanding Institution serving for the cause of the disabled for the year 2009 from the Department of Social Welfare,Puducherry.

ngoList.address: THALAI-K-KOL 2 FIRST STREET, LAXMI NAGAR LAWSPET PONDICHERRY 605 008
ngoList.title: THALAI K KOL
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Since in its inception in 1988, Thalai-k-kol, a modern Tamil theatre group primarily meant for the people of Pondicherry and Tamil Nadu involves in doing innovations and experiments in its theatre production in terms of interaction with traditional theatre forms and modern stage by way of incorporating various elements of artistic and aesthetic feeling and form of allied art forms. From the beginning, the group has been invited to perform at various regional, national and international theatre festivals and has also won a critical acclaim from the theatre circles in India and abroad. The essential core of the theatrical productions of Thalai-k-kol revolves around the Concept of Props Theatre and exploring the possibility of using the space not only for the horizontal movements but also for the vertical movements. Thalai-k-kols theatrical productions Karunchuzhi (The Black-Whirl) in 1990, Oosi (The Needle) in 1992 are in the format of Props Theatre for the first time in India written and directed by Dr.V. Arumugham under the Sangeet Natak scheme for supporting young theatre directors in India.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: New play Production Thanthiran ( A play based no Child Life of Krishna) staged at Cultural Complex Auditorium Pondicherry University. Thalaikkol Silver Jubilee Celebration 2013 was celebrated with Three days Thalaikkol Theatre Festival and Inter national Conference

New play Production Kooli Said to Kaali staged at Cultural Complex Auditorium Pondicherry University. Thalaikkol Theatre Festival 2015 was celebrated with Three days Thalaikkol Theatre Festival and Inter national Conference

ngoList.address: VUDHAVI KARANGAL SAMUGANALA THODAR KALVI IYAKKAM No.564, Mahatma Gandhi Road, Puducherry-605001.
ngoList.title: Vudhavi Karangal Boys Home
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Vudhavi Karangal Samuganala Thodar Kalvi Iyakkam which was started in the year 1991 and has been effectively functioning for the past 25 years committed to the total transformation of the children from their plight full situation to a law abiding citizen. At present our license strength is 125 children (boys), we have 122 boys in the age group of 5 to 18 years. For the boys above 18 years and who have grown up with us, we have after care facility for doing their higher studies in this academic year 2016  17 seven boys are pursuing undergraduate programme (two of them in B.E., and five of them in B.com.,) and five boys are studying in technical education. So far we have totally rehabilitated (Education, employment and Marriage) for 12 of our children. The children in the home are given apart from regular education, music lessons, yoga, martial art, dance and drama. We have a science club functioning within the home premises under the banner Rakesh Sharma Science Club under the guidance of Pondicherry Science Forum doing science activities and other related activities to motivate children for learning and reasoning science in day to day life. We have a musical troupe under the name Kalaimagal Iyal Isai Pattarai giving public performance in classical instrumental fusion with veena, miruthangam and other percussions, which enable the children to exhibit their hidden talents. It also serves as a therapy to soothe their inner stress of the past life. The journal club is being effectively functioning where children of the home contributed their articles, once in a month and a small hand written magazine is being circulated among the boys to improve their writing skills. The bigger boys above 18 years are motivated to play their part as a responsible citizen by organizing a small group of nearly 12 boys and 5 staffs has formed a blood donors unit for donating blood on voluntary basis on emergency call whenever necessary all around the clock. Children are taught to care for environment where they are being trained to make art exhibits from waste materials. They taught to make Puppets and give their own puppets show on environmental topics. Children studying IX std above are being trained in carpenter, welding, electrician, plumbering and book binding. This training are carried out during weekends and vacation. This trainings motivate children to know their full potential and its easy for the slow learners to choose their carrier in technical field. The children are given balanced diet prepared in hygienic ways, regular health check-up is carried out in the hostel premises with special camps conducted by specialized hospitals and doctors.
